summary: An ENBpreset that tries to focus on realism in Skyrim universe without sacrificing visibility and clarity, with ENBseries weathers and newest effects. Currently ENBseries v231.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2807/10444688336_01812463e1_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=8][color=red]FEATURES[/color][/size]

- Realistic Nights, Dungeons and Shadows!
- Newest effects of latest [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENBseries files v233[/url] by [url=http://enbdev.com/contact_en.htm]Boris Vorontsov[/url]
- Matso Bokeh depth of field
- ENBseries weather system for indoors and exteriors; Several Clear, Cloudy, Foggy, Rainy, Stormy, Snowy weathers with [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENBhelper[/url] by [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/about/]Alexander Blade[/url]
- Custom Rain, Snow and Sun textures
- New style SSAO and SSIL
- Water Parallax, caustics, dispersion and shadows
- Subsurface Scattering for skin, eyes and objects
- Realistic Time of days; Sunset, Sunrise, Day, Night
- Built in SMAA along with EdgeAA and 16x AF
- Realistic Bloom, Saturation and shadows
- Highly detailed Sunrays, reflection and skylighting
- Realistic eye adaptation
- Detailed Sky, Clouds, and Sun
- Realistic image based lighting with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1627949/]anamorfus[/url]
- Several Bundled Mods for ease of installation
[url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499]Skyrim Patches for ENBseries, custom Snow textures and Further Dark Dungeons[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3211380/]Mindflux[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29253/]Remove Interior Fog v2[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2628873/]rgabriel15[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930/]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/219646/]gargorias[/url]



[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7291/10444568403_c15439fe78_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=8][color=red]INSTALLATION[/color][/size]


[size=5][color=yellow][b]1. REQUIREMENTS[/b][/color][/size]

REQUIRED MODS

- [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENBseries files v233[/url] by [url=http://enbdev.com/contact_en.htm]Boris Vorontsov[/url]
- [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENBhelper[/url] by [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/about/]Alexander Blade[/url]

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450/]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2108933/]sydney666[/url]
or
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1627949/]anamorfus[/url]

Optional:

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32156/]Bright Torches[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/148758/]Khyron[/url] because vanilla torches are weak




[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5496/10444568283_5792b744b9_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=5][color=yellow][b]2. INSTALLING ENBseries[/b][/color][/size]

- Download latest [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENBseries files[/url]
- Copy d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe files from ENBseries /wrapper/ folder to your Skyrim main game folder.

[size=5][color=yellow][b]3. INSTALLING ELFX or RLO[/b][/color][/size]
Pick one!
- ELFX through NMM; default install is core, interior enhancer and exteriors. ELFX is darker indoors but it also adds some random point lights with a lot of bloom. Exterior is optional!

- Install RLO through NMM; default install is through custom options please carefully read the descriptions and install ones for your taste, however do not install adaptive interiors option!

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5483/10444381284_6b6445e6ab_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=5][color=yellow][b]4. INSTALLING CEM ENBpreset[/b][/color][/size]

- Copy all files and folders in /CEM ENBpreset/ folder to your Skyrim main game folder.
- Copy ENBhelper.dll from its archive folder to /Skyrim/ENBseries/ (this folder is under your main gamefolder) for weathers to work correctly.
- Disable AA, AF and FXAA from SkyrimLauncher and your graphic cards control panel.
- Activate .esp files that came with this ENBpreset according to your DLCs installed.
Revamped Exterior Fog
Removed Interior Fog v2 (also load the mod .esp files for every DLC you have, do not activate DLC files if you do not have the DLCs)
Mindflux Snow
Dark Dungeons (please make sure this DarkDungeons.esp is above DarkDungeonsForDawnguard.esp DarkDungeonsForDragonborn.esp in the load order, do not activate DLC files if you do not have the DLCs) 



[size=5][color=yellow][b]5. ADJUSTING[/b][/color][/size]


- Adjust the ENBlocal.ini file under your main Skyim folder according to [url=http://www.iparadigm.org/pages/pnenb/ENBoost.html]this tool[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/125861/]phinix[/url]
- Add/edit following lines in SkyrimPrefs.ini file under [DISPLAY] section
iMultiSample=0
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iPresentInterval=0
iMaxAnisotropy=0
bFXAAEnabled=0

- Calibrate your monitor using [url=http://www.lagom.nl/lcd-test/]this tool[/url], it may amaze you if you have never done it before. This is not just calibrating, but personalizing it for your eyes and taste.
- Make sure your in-game brightness is set to default.

OPTIONAL
- Add/edit following lines under Skyrim.ini file's [General] section; please note this may cause a huge FPS drop on some systems and increase load times. It will also alter your savegames from that point on and I highly suggest Stable Cell mods and SKSE use with this change.
uGridsToLoad=7
uExterior Cell Buffer=64

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3719/10444392176_2b02290a02_c.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=8][color=red]COMPATIBILITY[/color][/size]

- Predator Vision : Currently there are few tweaks to run the Predator Vision on any ENB, one of which includes enabling UseOriginalPostProcessing under ENBseries.ini file [EFFECTS] section.



[size=8][color=red]SUGGESTIONS[/color][/size]

- I encourage everyone to try [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32156/]Bright Torches[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/148758/]Khyron[/url], because vanilla torches just arent bright enough.
- People who try different ENBpresets all the time, I highly suggest using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24402]ENB MANAGER[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4959367/]LegendAeternus[/url] to easily add and remove ENBs!
- Correct load order of plugins is very important and I suggest [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6/]BOSS[/url] by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/310742/]wrinklyninja[/url]
- I strongly suggest combat altering overhauls, such as ASIS, SKYRE and DUEL. Dying has never been so much fun!
- I also suggest any mod that adds realism to the game, Frostall, Cloaks, Wet and Cold, etc. Anything that makes the game realistic.
- I suggest watching videos of Gopher and Hodilton on youtube to properly mod your game if you are a noob.
- If you are using COT, I suggest many of the COT patches; sun, rain and fog patches.

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2851/10444568243_9271f5c12b_c.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=8][color=red]CREDITS[/color][/size]
CEM

Alexander Blade
Matso
SkyrimTuner

Sharpshooter8
gargorias
phinix
Mindflux
rgabriel15

SomeDude
Jorge, Jose, Tiago and Diego
mrhaandi
Bethesda
and my beautiful wife for putting up with me while I spend my time making mods. :)


I am a working man, and time is money, thus all donations are welcomed! However, a thank you or an endorsement is all that I wish from you if you appreciate my work.

[url=https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=9VCD7U32NWSCY][img]https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donate_LG.gif[/img][/url]
author: SAM EKINCI

files.name: CEM ENBpreset
files.changelogHtml: Tweaked eye-adaptation and color correction to offer tad bit visibility when near light sources.
